SQLIDroid Agencies

Basic Android app that could be used for experimenting.

The application is simple enough so you can understand it easily.

It display all SQLI agencies. Itâ€™s composed of 3 screens : A main screen, a List view showing all available agencies, and a screen detailing a specific agency.
